name: Disney's Meet the Robinsons
description: What if you could control the future? What if time was on your side? Play as Wilbur Robinson and experience the thrills of time travel in all new adventures beyond the movie! With a ton of crazy gadgets at your disposal, battle enemies and solve puzzles while in pursuit of the dastardly Bowler Hat Guy and his diabolical robotic hat, Doris. It's up to you to thwart their evil plans and save the future!
